title: Ep. 1052 - Tom Cruise Was Right
description:
A new scientific meta-analysis destroys the “chemical imbalance” theory of depression, the very-vaccinated President of the United States comes down with COVID, and an entire class of second-graders “comes out” as “transgender” to their teacher.
